item.title: GIS in R
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: Intro Although R is widely used for data processing and statistical modelling, it is less frequently known for its powers of handing Geospatial Data. This presentation is aimed to show people the benefits of using R in their analyses. Why use R for GIS There are many benefits of using R for GIS, but to me the top three reasons would be: Integrate GIS and Statistial analysis: Load raw data, run analysis, and present the results all within a single script.
